name: Boxed In (itch) (NoamZeise)
description:
---Boxed In----

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move
Z          - Attack
Esc        - Pause

Notes:

-The attack direction is in the direction you are facing

-You only see the contents of a room when you collide with the dark grey area

-The score is based on how many rooms you discovered, the highscore is saved

-If you attack a bullet, it will reverse direction and belong to you, damaging
 an enemy if it hits one

--------------------------------------------------------

guide the protagonist in his adventure through a strange and changing world. See how many rooms you can discover without dying.

--------------------------------------------------------

Made with MonoGame for PROCJAM 2020
